text: Okan Chatziterzoglou (; born 5 March 1996) is a Greek professional footballer who plays as a centre-back for Super League 2 club Apollon Larissa. ==Career== In his career Chatziterzoglou also played for teams such as Xanthi and Panserraikos. ==References== ==External links== * * Okan Chatziterzoglou at lpf.ro Category:1996 births Category:Living people Category:People from Xanthi Category:Greek people of Turkish descent Category:Greek footballers Category:Greece youth international footballers Category:Greece under-21 international footballers Category:Association football defenders Category:Super League Greece players Category:Xanthi F.C. players Category:Football League (Greece) players Category:Panserraikos F.C. players Category:Liga I players Category:FC Academica Clinceni players Category:Greek expatriate footballers Category:Greek expatriate sportspeople in Romania Category:Expatriate footballers in Romania
title: Okan Chatziterzoglou
